Это автоматический перевод.

Произвольная линия (кривая)

Панель инструментов / Иконка:
       
Меню: Начертить > Линия > Произвольная линия (кривая)
Горячая клавиша: L, F
Команды: linefree | freehand | lf

Описание

With this tool you can draw freehand lines. This tool is usually used only sparingly since technical drawings require absolute accuracy. However, on some occasions this tool might come in handy, for example for broken edges like shown here:

Использование

  1. Place the mouse at the start point of the freehand line, press the left mouse button and keep it down.
  2. Now move the mouse around to draw the line. At the endpoint of the freehand line, let go of the mouse button.
